content.html: I hadn’t realised that Eddie Izzard now uses female pronouns. I wrote a tweet using incorrect pronouns, which I have now deleted. I would never misgender anyone intentionally and I apologise without reservation. 🙏🏻
content.value:
I hadn’t realised that Eddie Izzard now uses female pronouns. I wrote a tweet using incorrect pronouns, which I have now deleted. 

I would never misgender anyone intentionally and I apologise without reservation. 🙏🏻
